title: How do I add or delete a home screen?
answer:
To add or delete a home screen, pinch two fingers together on the home screen. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109276)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109277)

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109278)

 You can have nine home screens at most. 

 [Only blank home screens can be deleted.]()
